meanings.definition: Failed to care for or attend to.
meanings.sent1: The plant was neglected and withered away.
meanings.sent2: The old toy was neglected in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The neglected homework assignment sat untouched on the desk.
meanings.sent4: Her neglected dreams slowly faded into obscurity.
meanings.sent5: The neglected garden became overrun with weeds and thistles.

meanings.sent1: The neglected puppy looked forlorn in the shelter.
meanings.sent2: The neglected issue continued to cause problems.
meanings.sent3: The neglected sandwich lay forgotten on the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her neglected advice fell on deaf ears.
meanings.sent5: The neglected book gathered dust on the shelf.

meanings.definition: Not given proper attention or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The neglected house showed signs of disrepair.
meanings.sent2: The neglected child longed for affection.
meanings.sent3: The neglected email remained unread in the inbox.
meanings.sent5: The neglected project failed to meet its deadline.
